categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic ranks

nodes.text: A Clone Marshal Commander, or simply known as a Marshal Commander, was a high-ranking clone trooper commander, usually in command of a corps-level formation alongside a Jedi General counterpart, in the Grand Army of the Republic. Clone Commander CC-2224, nicknamed "Cody," was assigned to be the clone marshal commander of the 7th Sky Corps almost immediately after the outbreak of the Clone Wars, as was CC-1138 "Bacara," who led the 4th Sector Army's 21st Nova Corps. CC-5052 "Bly" served as a Clone Marshal Commander, leading the 327th Star Corps.
